name: strikeout
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(in baseball) the act making a batter (= person trying to hit the ball) fail to hit the ball three times: He averaged 9 strikeouts per game last season.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(in baseball) the act of failing three times to hit the ball or of causing a player to do this: Nolan Ryan was a great pitcher, and usually led the league in strikeouts.
